resources.string:
ãƒ»You and Computer have 3 ships each other.
 ãƒ»Each ship is a 3-adjacent-dots placed horizontally and vertically.
 ãƒ»Your ships and moves is marked with Blue color while Computer's are marked with Red.
 ãƒ»If you make a hit or a kill, you can try one more time, so does Computer. ãƒ»If you or Computer make a miss, next turn is enemy's. ãƒ»You need to sink all enemy's ships before Computer sinks yours.
